question: Will ‘BlockFi Yield’ become available to US citizens by June 30, 2022?
description:
If BlockFi’s ‘BlockFi Yield’ interest product launches prior to June 30, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

For the purpose of this market’s resolution, a “Launch” means that the general public of the United States (the majority of US citizens) is able to do the following: deposit crypto into an Interest Bearing Account directly on the BlockFi platform (US customers currently cannot). 

A closed or private beta will not count toward a “Yes” resolution for this market. A public beta will result in a “Yes” resolution for this market.

question: NCAA March Madness: What seed will the Champion be?
description:
The NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament, also known and branded as NCAA March Madness, is a single-elimination tournament played each spring in the United States, currently featuring 68 college basketball teams from the Division I level of the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA), to determine the national championship. 

This market will resolve, after the champion is decided, to whichever bracket contains the starting seed number of the winning team.

If for any reason the champion is not decided by April 11 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from NCAA (https://www.ncaa.com/march-madness-live/bracket), however other credible reporting may be used.

question: Will US student loan payments resume by May 2, 2022?
description:
This market asks whether repayment of federal student loans in the United States of America will resume by May 2, 2022.

If federal student loan repayments resume in the US for all federal student loans at any time between March 22, 2022, and May 2, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

For the purpose of this market's resolution, "federal student loan repayments resuming" means any one or all of these conditions being issued by the federal government of the United States of America regarding student loans: 

1) Loan repayments will be resumed
2) The interest rate will be above 0%
3) Collections on default loans will be resumed

The primary resolution source for this market will be https://studentaid.gov/announcements-events/covid-19/payment-pause-zero-interest, however other official information from the government of the United States of America and credible reporting will be considered.

question: Will Zelenskyy and Biden meet in person by April 30?
description:
This is a market on whether President of the United States Joseph Biden and President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy meet in person by April 30, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET). 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joseph Biden and Volodymyr Zelenskyy meet in person at any point between March 23, 2022, and April 30, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution sources for this market will be https://www.whitehouse.gov/, https://www.president.gov.ua/en, and/or information from other official webpages and verified accounts from the governments of the United States of America and Ukraine, however credible media sources will also suffice.

question: Will Katie Britt win the 2022 Alabama Republican Senate nomination?
description:
This is a market on whether Katie Britt will win the Republican nomination for Senator of Alabama. The primary election is scheduled to take place on May 24, 2022.

If Katie Britt wins the Republican nomination for Senator of Alabama, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

Determination of the Republican nominee for the 2022 election for the Senator of Alabama will be based on a consensus of credible reporting; or, if there is ambiguity, the final state election authority certification or other final official determination of the 2022 election results.

If no Republican nomination for Senator of Alabama is made by July 24, 2022, 12:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50-50.
